fulltext:
Tran Thanh Khai 
OBJECTIVE 
I would like to work hard and implement my abilities as well as improve my knowledge through techniques in a 
challenging company. I have been working for both outsource and product company, so I'm able to adapt to any 
working environment. 
I am looking for a back-end or full stack developer position I want to become a better software developer. 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
WisePass 
May 2018 - Now 
Software Developer 
Main responsibilities: 
- Developing internal web applications using .NET framework, Entity framework, HTML, CSS, Javascript, 
Jquery, SQL Server. 
- Maintain old features, analyze and implement new one. 
Keizu Viet Nam 
Apr 2016 - Feb 2018 
Software Developer 
Main responsibilities: 
- Developing enterprise web applications based on Force.com platform using Apex, Visual Force, HTML, CSS, 
Javascript, Jquery. 
- Developing applications using Java, VB.NET, VBA, Window Batch Scripting. 
PROJECTS 
WisePass ERP System 
(5/2018 - now) 
Customer  WisePass 
Description 
An internal system to manage business of WisePass. 
Team size 
3 
My position 
Back-end Developer 
My responsibilities 
Maintain old features, get requirement, analyze and implement new one. 
Technologies used 
C#, .NET, Entity Framework, MSSQL Server, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Jquery. 
Outsourcing projects of Keizu 
(4/2016 - 2/2018) 
Customer 
Many customers from Japan 
Description 
Primarily, we develop additional features based on Force.com platform. 
Team size 
1-5 
My position 
Full-stack Developer 
My responsibilities 
Maintain old features or implement new one base on document. 
Technologies used 
Apex, Visual Force, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Jquery, Java, VB.NET, VBA, 
Window Batch Scripting. 
SKILLS 
Problem solving 
I have strong problem solving skills. 
Communication 
I have strong communication skills, misunderstanding will never happen to 
me. 
Teamwork 
I can work as part of a team or individual. 
Learning 
As you can see, I have been working with many programming languages. 
Maybe I don't know any skill you need at this time (using tool A, framework 
B, library C, etc...), but I believe I can learn them quickly. 
EDUCATION 
Ton Duc Thang University 
Sep 2011 - Apr 2016 
Major: Computer Science 
CERTIFICATIONS 
TOEIC Certificate with score 635 issued by IIG. 
2016 
© topcv.vn
